item.title: Juicebox The Mix By Dj Andy Griff
item.description: A complimentary taste of "Juicebox" at Skyy Hartlepool Every Saturday night with Dj Andy Griff (Downstairs) Think of a cocktail of House/RnB/HipHop/Indie with a sprinkle of Pop Tracklisting: 1. Friendly Fires - Hurting 2. Gotye - Somebody That I Used To Know 3. Two Door Cinema Club - What You Know 4. Avicci - My Feelings For You 5. Fun - We Are Young 6. Snoop Feat Dre - Next Episode 7. Crooklyn Clan - Lets Get Ill 8. Justin Beiber - Boyfriend (Ying Yang Remix) 9. Snoop - Drop It Like Its Hot 10. Tyga - Rack City 11. Maroon 5 Feat Wiz Khalifa - Payphone 12. Rita Ora - How We Do (Biggie Remix) 13. Linkin Park - Burn It Down 14. Adelle Feat Daft Punk - Something About The Fire For Bookings and Info Contact: djandygriff@gmail.com www.facebook.com/djandygriff www.twitter.com/djandygriff

item.title: Usher Mixtape
item.description: To celebrate Ushers Uk Tour this month Ive put together a mix of his greatest hits carefully selected by myself goin through his long career. Tracklisting 1.Intro 2.Papers 3.Nice N Slow 4.U Got It Bad 5.Icebox Remix 6.Lil Freak 7.Superstar Interlude 8.Love In The Club 9.U Dont Have To Call 10.I Don't Know F/ Diddy 11.My Boo 12.Make Me Wanna Timb Remix 13.Hot Toddy F/ Jay Z 14.Bad Girl 15.Invented Sex Remix F/Trey & Keri 16.U-Turn 17.Daddys Home 18.I Need A Girl F/ Diddy 19.Confessions Part 2 F/ Twista,Kanye,Shyne Holla at me..... djandygriff@gmail.com www.facebook.com/djandygriff twitter: @djandygriff BB Pin : 21CDD679
item.dc:creator: Dj Andy Griff
item.itunes:summary:
To celebrate Ushers Uk Tour this month Ive put together a mix of his greatest hits carefully selected by myself goin through his long career.
Tracklisting
1.Intro 2.Papers 3.Nice N Slow 4.U Got It Bad 5.Icebox Remix 6.Lil Freak 7.Superstar Interlude 8.Love In The Club 9.U Dont Have To Call 10.I Don't Know F/ Diddy 11.My Boo 12.Make Me Wanna Timb Remix 13.Hot Toddy F/ Jay Z 14.Bad Girl 15.Invented Sex Remix F/Trey & Keri 16.U-Turn 17.Daddys Home 18.I Need A Girl F/ Diddy 19.Confessions Part 2 F/ Twista,Kanye,Shyne
Holla at me.....
djandygriff@gmail.com www.facebook.com/djandygriff twitter: @djandygriff BB Pin : 21CDD679

item.title: Notorious BIG Tribute Mix
item.description: This tribute mix was recorded live on March 9th 2010 the day Christopher Wallace was gunned down and tragically lost his life, RIP BIG STILL ONE OF THE GREATEST!!!!!!! TRACKLISTING: 1 - SKYS THE LIMIT F/112 2 - GET MONEY 3 - WHO SHOT YA 4 - HYPNOTIZE 5 - GIMME THE LOOT 6 - MACHINE GUN FUNK 7 - BROOKLYNS FINEST F/ JAY - Z 8 - JUICY 9 - PARTY AND BULLSHIT 10- CHRISTOPHER SMALLS SON SPEAKS 11- BIG POPPA 12- THE WHAT 13- FUCK YOU TONIGHT F/ R-KELLY 14- MISS U THIS IS JUST A SMALL COLLECTION OF HIS VAST SINGLES AVAILABLE PLEASE GO AND CHECK OUT HIS ALBUMS!!!!! FOR MORE INFO HIT ME UP ON : WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/DJANDYGRIFF WWW.MYSPACE.COM/DJANDYGRIFF MRGRIFFITHS2003@AOL.COM
